definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 3:3 latter-rain, spring-rain (i.e. showers of March–April; important, as strengthening and maturing crops) ; ´[[מ]] Ho 6:3 + 7 t. ;—related to [[גֶּשֶׁם]] as particular to general, opp. [[יוֹרֶה]] (former rain, q.v.): Ho 6:3, Je 5:24; so opp. [[מוֹרֶה]] Joe 2:23; particular under [[מָטָר]] De 11:14 (opp. [[יוֹרֶה]]), Zec 10:1 (+ [[מְטַר־גֶּשֶׁם]]), Job 29:23; ‖[[רְבִבִים]] Je 3:3; ´[[עָב מ]] Pr 16:15 spring-rain-cloud (sim. of king's favour).
